title: Kavurey Hospital-like visual restyle (theme, header/footer, homepage)

requirements.summary: Apply a cohesive modern hospital-style theme (colors, typography, spacing, component styling) across all existing pages without changing content structure.
acceptanceCriteria: The site uses a cohesive hospital-style theme consistently across header, footer, and all pages (Home, About, Services, Emergency, Contact, Appointments).
No new user-facing features are added; this change is purely visual/theme/layout styling.
All pages remain readable with accessible contrast and consistent heading/body typography.

file_operations.description: Update CSS theme variables (primary/secondary/muted/accent/background/foreground, borders/ring) and global base styles (typography, spacing defaults) to a modern hospital palette and typographic rhythm; keep light/dark mode variables consistent and accessible contrast.

Adjust Tailwind theme extension tokens to support the new hospital theme (e.g., container sizing/padding, fontFamily stack, shadows/radii where needed) while continuing to map colors to CSS variables for consistent theming.
Refine layout-level styling (page background treatment, main content spacing) to make the theme feel consistent across all pages without changing routing or page content.

requirements.summary: Restyle the global header and footer to match Kavurey Hospital-like presentation while preserving existing navigation items/links and responsiveness.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation links remain: Home, About, Services, Emergency, Contact, Appointments, and the existing 'Search on Google' link remains available on desktop and mobile.
Header remains sticky and responsive; mobile menu remains usable and visually aligned with the new theme.
Footer continues to show the current branding, contact details, and caffeine.ai attribution link.

file_operations.description: Restyle header to a cleaner hospital look (logo/brand lockup, spacing, subtle shadow/border, refined nav link styling) and make the primary call-to-action more prominent while preserving existing nav items and the 'Search on Google' link on both desktop and mobile. Use the shadcn-ui Button component for consistent CTA and nav styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Update footer layout/visual hierarchy (spacing, background, borders, typography) to match the new theme while keeping existing branding, contact details, and caffeine.ai attribution link unchanged in meaning and availability.

requirements.summary: Redesign the Home page section layout/styling (hero, emergency highlight, service highlights, trust signals, CTA) to resemble the reference hospital style without changing section meaning or CTA destinations.
acceptanceCriteria: Home page keeps the same major sections currently present (Hero, Emergency, Core Services, Trust Signals, CTA) but with updated layout/styling to match the requested reference style.
Existing CTAs still navigate to the same routes (/appointments, /services, /emergency, /contact) and the Google search opens in a new tab.
The hero image (/assets/generated/mahalaxmi-health-care-hero.dim_1600x700.png) remains displayed and looks integrated with the new design.

file_operations.description: Refactor Home page visual layout to a modern hospital landing style: stronger hero composition with integrated image treatment, clearer section headers, improved grid spacing, refined emergency highlight, service cards, trust signals, and CTA bandâ€”without removing or reinterpreting existing sections. Ensure the hero image at frontend/public/assets/generated/mahalaxmi-health-care-hero.dim_1600x700.png remains displayed. Use shadcn-ui Card and Button components to keep styling consistent across sections. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Adjust Tailwind theme tokens and global styles to support the new hospital palette/typography consistently across light and dark modes without editing read-only UI component sources.
acceptanceCriteria: Color tokens (primary/secondary/muted/accent/background) support the new theme consistently across pages and components.
No regressions in readability (text remains legible on backgrounds; buttons/links have clear states).
No changes are made to read-only/immutable UI component sources; styling is achieved via theme tokens, composition, and page/layout-level classes.

file_operations.description: Rework theme token values for both :root and .dark to align with a hospital-style palette (clean whites, medical blues/teals, calm neutrals; destructive remains clearly distinct) and tune base typography rules for consistent headings/body styling without modifying any files under frontend/src/components/ui.

Ensure Tailwind token mappings (colors via CSS variables, ring/alpha handling, typography defaults) support the updated palette and maintain consistent component states (hover/focus/active) across light/dark modes without editing read-only UI component sources.
